projects.title: AI-Powered E-commerce Platform
projects.description: Built a full-stack e-commerce solution with personalized product recommendations using machine learning algorithms. Features include real-time inventory management, advanced search filters, and seamless payment integration.

projects.title: Real-time Collaboration Tool
projects.description: Developed a web-based collaboration platform similar to Figma, enabling multiple users to work on design projects simultaneously with real-time synchronization and version control.

projects.title: Blockchain Voting System
projects.description: Created a secure, transparent voting system using blockchain technology to ensure election integrity. Features voter authentication, immutable vote records, and real-time result tracking.

projects.title: IoT Smart Home Dashboard
projects.description: Built an IoT dashboard for smart home management with real-time sensor data visualization, automated device control, and energy consumption analytics.

projects.title: Mobile Finance Tracker
projects.description: Developed a React Native mobile app for personal finance management with expense tracking, budget planning, and investment portfolio monitoring.

projects.title: AI Content Generator
projects.description: Created an AI-powered content generation tool using GPT models for creating blog posts, social media content, and marketing copy with customizable tone and style.
